attributes.action: Stand up against Israeli persecution of Palestinians and their places of worship
attributes.additional_details:
As a strong power in the west we must stand up for those who are being oppressed and defend their rights. Future generations will look back in disbelief and wonder how we allowed the Palestinian suffering to continue for so long. A human tragedy unfolding right infront of our eyes. 
History has taught us to speak up and one cannot advocate for racial equality and condemn other injustices, yet choose to ignore this. We cannot pick and choose whose human rights matter more.
attributes.background:
Intervene and place pressure on the Israeli government and army through legal channels and look to implement sanctions for their ongoing persecution of the people of Palestine and protect their places of worship. 
Support Palestinians with both military power and humanitarian aid.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309

Introduce sanctions against Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314

UK Government to formally recognise the State of Palestine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585313
